about_the_game:
FULL GAME
- No DLC, No In App Purchase

I am improving the graphics and gameplay constantly. If you would like to check what's in the next update please check the community hub for artwork and update list.
But if you feel you can support the development along please consider adding it to your wish list or get a copy. It will keep me motivating to give my best.

AN EXPERIENCE IN THE PALMS OF YOUR HANDS
Immerse yourself in one of the arcade action racing games, stunning visual and particle effects and epic action that turn every race into a real blockbuster race movie.

A BLAST OF ARCADE FUN
Get into action with mega vehicles blasting. Action is in your hand, trigger powerplay to take down your opponents with explosions! There are 20+ explosive triggers to knockdown opponents in 4 slightly different tracks.

SPLIT SCREEN
Have fun with friends and family with 2/4 players split screen.

BECOME A STREET LEGEND
Start your street journey in career mode by completing over difficult seasons and become a LEGEND by racing against up to 7 rival players.

The perfect game for fans of action arcade racing games!
